reviewText: He has quit a story. Sad and happy glad to have found his wonderful music.  If your after some real soul fool music. He's the fella you want. Mahalo Mr cruz

John has had an interesting life.  He is Hawaiis finest singer.  He devotes so much of his time to our young people teaching them Hawaiian customs, ukelele, and singing.  His beliefs are to keep the traditions alive.  This video is a testiment to his life.  Many times the people of the U.S. forget about some of the most musically gifted people in the world, they live Hawaii.

I have loved John Cruz music for a long time and seeing his story only magnifies the love.
Thanks for this!

It actually exceeded my expectations. John has a really interesting story to tell. It's candid and honest. He never tries to put a good spin on himself he just opens up and very thoughtfully shares aspects of his life. Not all that glitters is gold and John has had his share of ups and downs. It is a very good DVD.
